title: Saepinum
description: An ancient town of Samnium captured by the Romans in 293 B.C., located on the road between Beneventum and Corfinium.

properties.description: 1:500,000 scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 18853

properties.description: Centerpoint of Saepinum, coordinates following GeoHack.
properties.title: Imagery location of Saepinum
